tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_diseases (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    disease_severity INT,
    last_occurrence_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crop_diseases (
    disease_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(100),
    crop_affected VARCHAR(50),
    disease_symptoms TEXT,
    preventive_measures TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_date DATE,
    disease_id INT,
    affected_area DECIMAL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE preventive_measures (
    measure_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_id INT,
    measure_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_diseases (
    disease_id UUID,
    disease_name STRING,
    crop_name STRING,
    affected_area INT,
    reported_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE preventive_measures (
    measure_id UUID,
    measure_name STRING,
    recommended_crop STRING,
    application_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE disease_reports (
    report_id UUID,
    disease_id UUID REFERENCES crop_diseases(disease_id),
    reported_by STRING,
    report_date DATE,
    severity_level INT
);
CREATE TABLE DiseaseCases (id INT, disease_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), date DATE, severity INT)
CREATE TABLE Diseases (id INT, disease_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Locations (id INT, location_name VARCHAR(255), region VARCHAR(255), country VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE PreventiveMeasures (id INT, disease_name VARCHAR(255), preventive_measure TEXT)
CREATE TABLE DiseaseReports (id INT, disease_id INT, location_id INT, report_date DATE)
